column1: The Federal Reserve Board today approved action by the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis increasing the discount rate at that bank from 5 percent to 5-1/4 percent effective immediately.The Federal Reserve Board also today approved action by the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas increasing the discount rate at that bank from 5 percent to 5-1/4 percent effective Friday, February 4, 2000.
column2: The Federal Reserve Board also today approved action by the Board of Directors of the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas increasing the discount rate at that bank from 5 percent to 5-1/4 percent effective Friday, February 4, 2000.
